item.title: Students Gain Insight into Police Services at Open House Program in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: As part of the Police Martyrs Commemoration Week, the Jogulamba Gadwal District Police organized an Open House Program at the Armed Reserve (AR) Headquarters, drawing enthusiastic participation from students of seven schools and one college. Around 600 students from government and private institutions took part in the event, gaining valuable insights into the functioning of various police departments.
The program aimed to create awareness among students about the roles and responsibilit...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
